title: ‘Look and Talk’ will let you gaze at your Nest Hub Max to activate Assistant, here’s how it works
content:
In October of 2020, one Nest Hub Max user managed to get an early look at “Blue Steel.” This capability lets you just gaze at your compatible Smart Display to trigger Google Assistant, and a launch under the name “Look and Talk” might be coming soon.

more…

The post ‘Look and Talk’ will let you gaze at your Nest Hub Max to activate Assistant, here’s how it works appeared first on 9to5Google.
